short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple multi-platform analytics debugger to visualize your events.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly snap and check outgoing analytics events.

Seal Analytics Debugger allows you see what analytics events were fired at a glance: 

‚ÑπÔ∏è A clear view of all tracking events with multiple platforms including Amplitude, Mixpanel, and Segment.
üìä Click to open pop up from right top corner, view detailed event properties, user properties/traits in real time without leaving the page. 
üîµ You can also see how many events are there in a page without opening the extension, by glancing at the blue badge on extension icon.
